title: Service Desk Technician II
jobDescription:
• Works with internal and external customers to log, categorize and prioritize incoming Incidents or Service Requests received via phone, chat, email, or service portal. This would also include customer validation to ensure categorization, prioritization, and security.
  • Investigates and diagnose issues for the customer using both internal and external knowledge bases as well as utilizing technical troubleshooting skills with the goal of first contact resolution.
  • Resolve incidents and service requests as soon as possible to attain the highest possible first contact resolution rate.
  • Be an escalation point for level 1 technicians. May also be asked to assist with VIP users or when an urgent resolution is needed.
  • Ability to identify patterns of the tickets the service desk is receiving and communicate with the major incident team. This would include documentation of steps to reproduce the issue, where in the environment the problem is happening, and the population of affected customers.
  • Clear verbal and written communication with customers to be able to properly troubleshoot and resolve issues in a friendly and efficient manner. Must also be able to educate customers on available tools such as self-service options, AI (Artificial Intelligence) bot, knowledgebase, and service portal when pertinent.

Functional Knowledge:

  • Requires analytic and problem-solving skills
  • Must be able to listen and communicate with a variety of technical and non-technical customers both verbally and in writing in a professional and friendly manner. Would also require de-escalation and situational awareness skills.
  • Ability to document work properly that could be used both internally within IT and for users.
  • Business awareness can be used to work with other teams throughout the organization.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

Business Acumen:

  • Applies basic knowledge of business gained through formal education or related work experience

Leadership Impact:

  • Help others as directed
  • I May be asked to work on issues or requests that are not fully documented and be able to turn that into a documented process
  • Has the ability to provide guidance and training to level 1 technicians

Problem Solving:

  • Uses documented service desk procedures found in the knowledgebase to solve common problems
  • Also brings previously attainted troubleshooting savviness to position to troubleshoot undocumented issues
  • Recognize patterns of issues
  • Use of online guides/training forums

Interpersonal Skills:

  • Must be friendly and eager to work with customers and teammates.
  • Willingness to learn and mentor others.
  • Follow guidelines from management and make suggestions when pertinent
  • Has the desire and ability to grow personal knowledge and efficiency rates of both self and the team

Education Experience:

  • Formal training or certification in a relevant field
  • Bachelor s degree in relevant field preferred

title: Release Manager
jobDescription:
• The Release Manager is responsible for overseeing the planning, coordination, and execution of software releases within an organization
  • They collaborate with various teams, including development, testing, operations, and project management, to ensure the successful delivery of software products or updates
  • The Release Manager plays a critical role in managing the release process, minimizing risks, and ensuring the smooth deployment of software releases

Key Responsibilities:

  • Release Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to establish release schedules, milestones, and deliverables
  • Define release objectives, scope, and dependencies
  • Create and maintain release plans and communicate them to relevant teams
  • Release Coordination: Coordinate activities across multiple teams involved in the release process, including development, testing, infrastructure, and support
  • Ensure that all necessary resources and dependencies are available and aligned to meet release timelines
  • Risk Management: Identify, assess, and mitigate risks associated with software releases
  • Proactively identify potential issues and develop contingency plans
  • Communicate risks to stakeholders and implement strategies to minimize their impact on release timelines and quality
  • Release Execution: Lead the execution of software releases, including coordinating the deployment of applications, configurations, and infrastructure changes
  • Monitor the release process, track progress, and ensure adherence to release plans
  • Resolve issues or conflicts that arise during the release process
  • Communication and Reporting: Facilitate effective communication between various stakeholders, including development teams, project managers, operations teams, and business stakeholders
  • Provide regular updates on release status, including key milestones, risks, and issues
  • Prepare and present release reports and metrics to management

title: ERP Engineer

ambitionBoxData.Title: BDx Data Centers Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• Provide expert advice on SAP modules like FICO, MM, PM & PS
  • Candidate should be able to provide in-depth functionality & features available in SAP HANA.
  • He should advice customer on how to use the best business processes as provided in SAP.
  • Collect & Analyse requirements on the following:
  • Business processes and parameters
  • Suggest solutions to customer based on best business practices.
  • Creation of Functional and Technical Specifications documentation for the project including specifications for customizations, data migration, and system integrations
  • Support functional consultants in designing solutions for the identified gaps.
  • Assist in data transfer mapping.
  • Data is required to be transferred to SAP from the legacy systems (e.g., Master Data like Material Master, Customer/Vendor master etc.)
  • Determining reporting requirements
  • Standard SAP Reports and any Customized Reporting required.
  1. Assist in the development of business process descriptions.
  2. Ensuring compliance with industry regulations, standards, and tools/documents
  3. Conduct implementation & training workshops:
    • SAP users training
    • SAP E2E process guidance & documentation
  4. Provide guidance on test plan.
    • How to test SAP functionality for the required Business processes and ensure that all scenarios are covered.
    • Conduct unit tests based on customer defined scenarios.
  5. Coordinate with other module SAP Consultants for Integration requirements.
  6. Provide Functional Specifications to Technical team for customized developments.
  7. A history of leading and managing successful ERP projects.
Requirements
  1. Graduate or postgraduate in IT or other fields or equivalent AND/OR Evidence of Exceptional ability of the role.
  2. 5+ Years of total experience.
Skills
Hands on experience on SAP, FICO, MM, PM & PS
